root.name: U.B. Funkeys
root.description: StoryA new funkey is born in funkeystown, by the name of U.B. He is greeted by the mayor of funkeystown and is told the story of Master Lox. He destroyed the funkeystown portals, disabling access to other funkey lands, and you're job, as U.B. and the other funkeys, is to fix the portals and restore order.GameplayThe gameplay involves a U.B. hub on which you place the funkey toys, thus transforming U.B. to that funkey and displaying him on screen. You can explore funkeystown, play games, make your home, talk to other funkeys and play multiplayer games.
